mapper.select: SELECT t.id, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') requestDate, t.student_number studentNumber, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.nation,'MZ') nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.sex,'XB') sex, t.idcard idcard, t.ride_zone rideZone, t.family_address familyAddress, t.phone phone, t.img img, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.province,'t_sys_administrative_divisions','ID','NAME') province, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.regional,'t_sys_administrative_divisions','ID','NAME') regional, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.city,'t_sys_administrative_divisions','ID','NAME') city, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.request_project,'SQXM') requestProject, t.request_reason requestReason, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.student_id,'T_XG_STUDENT','STUDENT_ID','NAME') studentId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.class_id,'T_XG_CLASS','CLASS_ID','CLASS_NAME') classId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.major_code,'t_xg_major','major_code','major_name') majorCode, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag FROM T_XG_STUDENT_REISSUE_WF t WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc

SELECT t.id, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(t.request_date,'hh24:mi') requestDate, t.nation nation, t.sex sex, t.img img, t.idcard idcard, t.ride_zone rideZone, t.family_address familyAddress, t.phone phone, t.province province, t.regional regional, t.city city, t.request_project requestProject, t.request_reason requestReason, t.class_id classId, t.major_code majorCode, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag, t.student_number studentNumber, t.student_id studentId FROM T_XG_STUDENT_REISSUE_WF t WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_XG_STUDENT_REISSUE_WF (id, img, requester, request_date, nation, sex, creator, create_time, create_dept, request_flag, student_number, major_code, class_id, idcard, ride_zone, family_address, phone, province, regional, city, request_project, request_reason, student_id) values (FUNC_GET_UUID, #{img}, '${studentId}', to_date('${requestDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), '${nation}', '${sex}', '${creator}', sysdate, '${createDept}', '0', '${studentNumber}', '${majorCode}', '${classId}', '${idcard}', '${rideZone}', '${familyAddress}', '${phone}', '${province}', '${regional}', '${city}', '${requestProject}', '${requestReason}', '${studentId}')
mapper.update: update T_XG_STUDENT_REISSUE_WF SET img = #{img}, request_date = to_date(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), changer= #{changer}, nation = #{nation}, sex = #{sex}, idcard = #{idcard}, ride_zone = #{rideZone}, family_address = #{familyAddress}, phone = #{phone}, province = #{province}, regional = #{regional}, city = #{city}, request_project = #{requestProject}, request_reason = #{requestReason}, change_time= sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.dept_id as "value", t.dept_name as "label" FROM T_SYS_DEPT t
select t.name as "label", t.person_id as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t where t.person_id in(select person_id from t_rs_employee_dept where dept_id like FUNC_GET_SCHOOL_RANGE (#{deptId},#{level}))
SELECT name from t_rs_employee WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT dept_name from t_sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId}
